## Overview

The next word prediction application suggests 3 words for your determinant on the word or phrase you entered. It is instructive to note that English is the only language encouraged.


## Instructions

Please the instructions below:

+ Enter a word or phrase, into the textbox "Input Text".

+ Select the number of predicted words [1-3].

+ Your predicted next word will appear beneath the box.
